episode_summary: In this episode, Dr. Erin Helle discusses the intricacies of seller financing and loan assumptions, emphasizing the importance of understanding lean positions to protect sellers' interests. She provides actionable insights on how REALTORS can leverage these financing options to close more deals, especially in a high-interest-rate environment. The episode is a valuable resource for agents looking to expand their knowledge and offer innovative solutions to clients.
